name: arrayAppend
description: Appends an array element to an array.

params.name: array
params.description: The array to which the element should be appended.

params.name: value
params.description: The element to append. Can be any type.

params.name: merge
params.description: When true appends array elements individually to the specified array. When false (default), the new array is appended as a single element.
